document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: MCC guards 
Date: Wed, 30 Jun 2021 16:36:24 +0000 
Thanks â– . On number #2, yes that is certainly my memory of the interview, and we included that information in the 
pros memo. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesda , June 30, 2021 11:32 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: MCC guards 
Hi, 
Two things: 
1. The guards that Noel named as not doing rounds/counts and pre-filling were COs 
2. According to the notes of his interview with us, said he knew but did not tell anyone that was 
released or Epstein was without a cellmate. He also stated that he was waiting for the captain or warden to put 
someone new in the cell. In a recent interview with OIG, he says that he didn't know tha was gone and 
denies his prior statement. Do you have a  recollection of this interview? If so, Lyeson wants to know if we think the 
notes/MOI are correct. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District 
of New York 
EFTA00022022
